T02D1898:284a-1: da sa kro dha ba lim bi dhi:/
T02D1898:284a-3: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga / bcom ldan
T02D1898:284a-4: 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1898:284a-5: // khro bo bcu'i gtor ma ni rang nyid 'jam
T02D1898:284a-6: pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1898:284a-7: pas cho ga yan lag gsum gyis mdun du bskyed
T02D1898:284a-9: skad cig gis mdun du dmigs la h'um las lce
T02D1898:284a-10: rdo rje sbu gu'i rnam par blta bar byas la
T02D1898:284b-0: / aom a'a:ya m'a nta kri ta ai @284b mam
T02D1898:284b-1: ba lim grihna grihna h'um zhes brjod la bdud rtsi
T02D1898:284b-2: sbyar ba'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyangs te gong gi
T02D1898:284b-3: sngags lan gsum brjod pas gsol bar bsam mo //
T02D1898:284b-4: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod de zhabs bsil dang so rtsi byin nas /
T02D1898:284b-5: dril bu dkrol nas mi bskyod pa ni ye shes
T02D1898:284b-6: chel sogs pa'i bstod pa byas nas yi ge brgya
T02D1898:284b-7: pa brjod la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1898:284b-8: de bzhin du khro bo bcu ka la yang bya'o //
T02D1898:284b-9: yi ge gsum gyi bar du khro bo bcu'i rang rang gi sngags bcug ste /
T02D1898:284b-10: de'i steng du ai mam ba lim gri hana grihn'a zhes bya ba bsnan pa ni sngags so //
T02D1898:284b-11: gzhan cho ga thams cad gong dang mthun no //
T02D1898:284b-12: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D1898:284b-14: // /'di'i lag len ni mdun du bu las 'khor lo
T02D1898:284b-15: rtsibs bcu pa lte ba dang bcu gcig par bsams
T02D1898:284b-16: la / de'i steng du aa las zla bar bsam /
T02D1898:284b-17: de'i steng du h'um dgu brum dang bcu /
T02D1898:284b-18: de rnams gyur pa las 'od 'phros khro bo bcu
T02D1898:284b-19: spyan drangs nas phyag mtshan rnams la thim par bsams
T02D1898:284b-20: la / 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i steng du khro bo bcu bsam mo //
T02D1898:284b-21: yang rang gi yi dam ltar bsgoms la snying ga'i
T02D1898:284b-22: sa bon gyis khro bo bcu spyan drangs nas de
T02D1898:284b-23: rnams la bstim ste mgron spyan drangs pa'o //
T02D1898:284b-24: de nas gor ma dmigs pa las /
T02D1898:284b-27: de'i steng du aom a'a: h'um gsum las thod pa'i skyed pu gsum /
T02D1898:284b-28: de'i steng du aa las thod pa phyi dkar ba
T02D1898:284b-29: nang dmar ba bsams te de'i nang du gtor ma
T02D1898:284b-30: / de'i steng du bi mu ra shu ma go
T02D1898:284b-31: ku da ha na zhes bya ba yi ge bcu
T02D1898:284b-32: las sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bskyed la de nas
T02D1898:284b-33: yam las rlung g-yos te me 'bar bas dam tshig
T02D1898:284b-34: ge bdud rtsi sbyang bar bsam /
T02D1898:284b-35: de'i steng du padma zla ba'i steng du h'um las
T02D1898:284b-36: rdo rje rten lnga pa la h'um gis mtshan pa
T02D1898:284b-37: de las 'od spros pas 'go min gyi gnas na
T02D1898:284b-38: yod pa'i khor bo bcu'i thugs ka nas ye shes
T02D1898:284b-39: kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas de gnyis dbyer med
T02D1898:284b-41: de nas aom a'a:h'um zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas dbyer med du bsam mo //
T02D1898:284b-42: de nas sngags brjod la gdab po //
T02D1898:284b-43: de nas grub nas khro bo re la mchod pa re dang bstod pa re bya //
T02D1898:284b-44: ma grub na bcu byar la spogs cig bya'o //
T02D1898:284b-46: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu ba'am /
T02D1898:284b-47: yang khro bo rnams h'um la /
T02D1898:285a-3: brum stong pa nyid du bsams la gtor mas gtsang gtor /
T02D1898:285a-6: gtor ma de rnams gsol bas chos nyid la thim pa'am //
T02D1898:285a-7: ye shes la ye shes thim par bsam mo //
T02D1898:285a-8: dur khrod pa rnams gtor ma gsol ba bde bar bsam mo //
T02D1898:285a-19: gshin rje mthar byed ni mdog sdo ba /
T02D1898:285a-22: phyag g-yas na thob dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285a-23: shes ba mthar byed ni mdog dkar pa zhal g-yas sngo ba /
T02D1898:285a-25: phyag g-yas na dbyug pa deng ral gri / g-yon
T02D1898:285a-26: na rin po che dang padma'o / padma mthar byed
T02D1898:285a-28: / zhal g-yas nag pa g-yon dkar pa'o //
T02D1898:285a-29: phyag g-yas na padma dang ral gri'o //
T02D1898:285a-30: g-yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo /
T02D1898:285a-31: bgegs mthar gyed ni mdog sngo ba'o //
T02D1898:285a-32: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar pa'o //
T02D1898:285a-33: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285a-34: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni mdog sngon po //
T02D1898:285a-35: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02D1898:285a-36: phyag g-yas na lcags kyu dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285a-37: dbyug sngon can ni mdog sngon po zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02D1898:285a-38: phyag g-yas na dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri'o //
T02D1898:285a-39: g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285a-40: stobs po che ni mdog sngon po //
T02D1898:285a-41: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar pa'o //
T02D1898:285a-42: phyag g-yas na rtse gsum dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285a-43: mi g-yo ba ni mdog sngo ba /
T02D1898:285a-44: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02D1898:285a-45: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang rdo rje /
T02D1898:285a-46: g-yon na zhags pa dang 'khor lo //
T02D1898:285a-47: mig zur gyi gzugs kyi lta ba byis pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1898:285a-48: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni mdog ser po
T02D1898:285a-49: zhal g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba'o / phyag g-yas
T02D1898:285b-0: na 'khor lo ser po dang ral @285b gri /
T02D1898:285b-1: g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285b-2: gnod mdzes rgyal po ni mog sngo ba zhal g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba'o //
T02D1898:285b-3: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri / g-yon na rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1898:285b-4: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyi phyag 'og ma gnyis ni rang 'od la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya'o ;
T02D1898:285b-5: / gshin rje gshed la rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1898:285b-6: padma mthar byed la ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
